<voice 00891_00051592><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「そこで　運悪く　凶悪な魔物に襲われ
　……彼女は　命を奪われた。
　その花は……彼女が握りしめていたものだ。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51592.ko:
<voice 00891_00051592><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 하필이면 흉악한 마물을 만나
　……목숨을 잃었다더구나.
　그 꽃은…… 잔나 씨가 쥐고 있던 거다.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51592.zh-Hans:
<voice 00891_00051592><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>她不巧被凶暴的怪物袭击
……便被夺去了性命。
那花……是她握在手里的东西。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51592.zh-Hant:
<voice 00891_00051592><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>她不巧被凶暴的怪物襲擊
……便被奪去了性命。
那花……是她握在手裡的東西。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51593.en: <voice 00951_00051593><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>That's a lie......<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51593.ko: <voice 00951_00051593><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>: 말도 안 돼………………<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75627.en: <voice 00961_00075627><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>...Brother, you're lying!!<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75627.ja: <voice 00961_00075627><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>「……兄さまのウソつきっ！<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75627.zh-Hans: <voice 00961_00075627><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>……兄长大人是大骗子！<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75627.zh-Hant: <voice 00961_00075627><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>……兄長你騙人！<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51594.en:
<voice 01011_00051594><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>We both had dreams... We promised each other we'd
make our dreams come true!!<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51594.ja:
<voice 01011_00051594><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>「だって　夢があるって……
　お互いの夢を　かなえようって

51594.ko:
<voice 01011_00051594><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>: 이루고 싶은 꿈이 있다고……

51594.zh-Hans:
<voice 01011_00051594><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>我们明明……
约好了彼此都要
努力实现梦想！！<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51594.zh-Hant:
<voice 01011_00051594><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>我們明明……
約好了彼此都要
努力實現夢想！！<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51595.en: <voice 01044_00051595><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Calm down, Anlucia!<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51595.ja: <voice 01044_00051595><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「落ちつくんだ　アンルシア！<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51595.ko: <voice 01044_00051595><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 진정해, 안루시아!<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51595.zh-Hans: <voice 01044_00051595><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>冷静一点，安露西雅！<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51595.zh-Hant: <voice 01044_00051595><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>冷靜一點，安露西亞！<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51596.en: <voice 01114_00051596><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>It... It can't be...<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51596.ja:
<voice 01114_00051596><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>「そんな…………。 
　そんなのって　ないよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51596.ko:
<voice 01114_00051596><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가…………. 
　이건 거짓말이야…….<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51596.zh-Hans:
<voice 01114_00051596><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>怎么会………… 
怎么可能会有这种事……<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51596.zh-Hant:
<voice 01114_00051596><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>怎麼會………… 
怎麼可能會有這種事……<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51597.en:
<voice 01161_00051597><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>Please... You'll grant my wish, won't you? I'm begging
you... Bring Janna back to life.<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51597.ja:
<voice 01161_00051597><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>「ねえ　願いをかなえてくれるんでしょう？
　お願いよ……ジャンナを生き返らせて。<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51597.ko:
<voice 01161_00051597><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>: 소원을 들어주는 꽃이라고 했지?
　부탁이야…… 잔나를 되살려 줘.<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51597.zh-Hans:
<voice 01161_00051597><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>喂，你不是可以实现愿望吗？
求求你……让江娜复活吧。<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51597.zh-Hant:
<voice 01161_00051597><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>喂，你不是可以實現願望嗎？
求求你……讓珍娜復活吧。<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51598.ja: <voice 01201_00051598><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>「お願い……開いて…………。<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51598.ko: <voice 01201_00051598><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>: 제발…… 꽃을 피워 줘………….<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51598.zh-Hans: <voice 01201_00051598><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>求求你……开花吧…………<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51598.zh-Hant: <voice 01201_00051598><start_lip_sync n02080 _normal m00001>求求你……開花吧…………<stop_lip_animation n02080 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51599.en:
<voice 01356_00051599><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...No matter how much you wish for it, a life lost can
never be returned.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51599.ja:
<voice 01356_00051599><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「……どんなに願っても 
　失われた命は　決して戻らない。 <stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51599.ko:
<voice 01356_00051599><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: ……몇 번이고 소원을 빌어도
　잃어버린 목숨은 절대 돌아오지 않아.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51599.zh-Hans:
<voice 01356_00051599><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……不论你如何祈求，
失去的生命也不会活过来。 <stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51599.zh-Hant:
<voice 01356_00051599><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……不論妳如何祈求，
失去的生命也不會活過來。 <stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51600.en:
<voice 01396_00051600><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>The world will soon be shrouded in darkness.
Whatever fate awaits us...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51600.ja:
<voice 01396_00051600><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「この先の時代　世界は
　深い闇に　覆われてゆくだろう。
　そこで　どんな運命が待ち受けていようと……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51600.ko:
<voice 01396_00051600><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 앞으로 이 세계는
　깊은 어둠으로 뒤덮일 거다.
　그때 어떤 운명과 마주한다 해도……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51600.zh-Hans:
<voice 01396_00051600><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>今后的时代，
世界将会逐渐被黑暗笼罩吧。
无论前方会有什么样的命运等待着我们……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51600.zh-Hant:
<voice 01396_00051600><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>今後的時代，
世界將會逐漸被黑暗籠罩吧。
無論前方等著我們的是什麼樣的命運……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51601.en:
<voice 01436_00051601><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>You must be strong so you won't ever cry again,
Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51601.ja:
<voice 01436_00051601><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「二度と　泣かなくていいように
　強くなれ　アンルシア。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51601.ko:
<voice 01436_00051601><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 다시는 눈물 흘리지 않도록
　강해져라, 안루시아.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51601.zh-Hans:
<voice 01436_00051601><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>为了不再流泪，
变强吧，安露西雅。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51601.zh-Hant:
<voice 01436_00051601><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>為了不再流淚，
變強吧，安露西亞。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51329.en:
<voice 00345_00051329><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Behind this gate lies the final key to releasing her
sealed memories...<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51329.ja:
<voice 00345_00051329><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「この門の向こうには　閉ざされた記憶を開く
　最後のカギ……<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51329.ko:
<voice 00345_00051329><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: 이 문 너머에는 봉인된 기억을 열
　마지막 열쇠가……<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51329.zh-Hans:
<voice 00345_00051329><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>那扇门后，就是打开紧闭的记忆的
最后一把钥匙……<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51329.zh-Hant:
<voice 00345_00051329><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>那扇門後，就是打開緊閉的記憶的
最後一把鑰匙……<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51330.en:
<voice 00395_00051330><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Beyond this point, lies that girl's most haunting
memory.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51330.ja:
<voice 00395_00051330><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「この先に　あの子にとって
　最も　いまわしい記憶が　眠っています。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51330.ko:
<voice 00395_00051330><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: 그 아이에게
　가장 떠올리고 싶지 않은 기억이
　잠들어 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51330.zh-Hans:
<voice 00395_00051330><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>这后面沉睡着对那孩子来说
最不堪回首的记忆。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51330.zh-Hant:
<voice 00395_00051330><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>這後面沉睡著對那孩子來說
最不堪回首的記憶。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51331.en: <voice 00555_00051331><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Please destroy the guardian over her sealed memories...<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51331.ja:
<voice 00555_00051331><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「記憶を封じる番人を　討ち滅ぼし
　あの子を　解き放ってやってください……。<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51331.ko:
<voice 00555_00051331><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: 기억을 봉인한 파수꾼을 물리치고
　그 아이를 해방시켜 주십시오…….<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51331.zh-Hans:
<voice 00555_00051331><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>请击败封印着记忆的守门人，
让那孩子获得解放吧……<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51331.zh-Hant:
<voice 00555_00051331><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>請擊敗封印著記憶的守門人，
讓那孩子獲得解放吧……<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51332.en:
<voice 00862_00051332><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...Even if it takes an eternity, so be it. You must
return her memories to me.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51332.ja:
<voice 00862_00051332><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「……いつまでも　待っています。
　あなたが　あの子の記憶を
　取り戻してくれる　その時を。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51332.ko:
<voice 00862_00051332><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: ……언제까지고 기다리겠습니다.
　당신이 그 아이의 기억을
　되찾아 줄 그 순간을.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51332.zh-Hans:
<voice 00862_00051332><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……我会一直等下去，
直到你将那孩子的记忆
取回为止。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51332.zh-Hant:
<voice 00862_00051332><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……我會一直等下去，
直到你將那孩子的記憶
取回為止。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51333.en: <voice 00655_00051333><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...That girl's fate, I leave to you.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51333.ja: <voice 00655_00051333><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「……あの子のことを　頼みます。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51333.ko: <voice 00655_00051333><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: ……그 아이를 부탁드립니다.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51333.zh-Hans: <voice 00655_00051333><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……那孩子就拜托你了。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51333.zh-Hant: <voice 00655_00051333><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……那孩子就拜託你了。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51334.en: <voice 01989_00051334><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>I can no longer fight...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51334.ja: <voice 01989_00051334><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>私は　もう戦えない……。<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51334.ko: <voice 01989_00051334><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>난 이제 싸울 수 없어…….<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51334.zh-Hans: <voice 01989_00051334><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>我已经无法再战斗下去了……<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51334.zh-Hant: <voice 01989_00051334><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>我已經無法再戰鬥下去了……<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51335.en: <voice 02139_00051335><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>Dreams shattered, loved ones lost...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51335.ja: <voice 02139_00051335><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>夢は砕け　愛する者を亡くし……<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51335.ko: <voice 02139_00051335><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>꿈은 깨지고, 사랑하는 사람을 잃고……<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51335.zh-Hans: <voice 02139_00051335><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>梦想破灭，也失去了珍爱的人……<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51335.zh-Hant: <voice 02139_00051335><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>夢想破滅，也失去了珍愛的人……<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51336.en:
<voice 02324_00051336><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>What do you want from me,
someone so empty and alone?<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51336.ja:
<voice 02324_00051336><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>ましてや　心すら
空っぽになった私に　何を望むの。<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51336.ko:
<voice 02324_00051336><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>이제 마음마저
텅 빈 나에게 뭘 바라는 거야?<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51336.zh-Hans:
<voice 02324_00051336><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>对连心都空荡荡的我，
又奢求什么呢？<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51336.zh-Hant:
<voice 02324_00051336><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>對連心都空蕩蕩的我，
又奢求什麼呢？<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51337.en:
<voice 02509_00051337><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>Still, if you wish to awaken me, I want
you to witness this for yourself...<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51337.ja:
<voice 02509_00051337><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>それでも　なお
私を　揺り起こそうというなら
身をもって　知りなさい。<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51337.ko:
<voice 02509_00051337><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>그럼에도 불구하고
나를 깨우려 한다면
너희에게도 가르쳐 주겠어.<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51337.zh-Hans:
<voice 02509_00051337><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>即便如此
你也要将我摇醒的话，
你就好好切身体会吧。<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51337.zh-Hant:
<voice 02509_00051337><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>即便如此
你也要將我搖醒的話，
你就好好切身體會吧。<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51338.en:
<voice 02734_00051338><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>There is no such thing as hope in this world,
we wallow in grief and wander around broken,
while an endless despair spreads all around!<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51338.ja:
<voice 02734_00051338><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>この世界に　希望などなく
なげき　まどい　さまよいゆくだけの
果てなき絶望のみが　広がっていることを！<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51338.ko:
<voice 02734_00051338><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>이 세상에 희망 따위는 없을뿐더러
비탄과 고통 속에서 하염없이 헤매는
끝없는 절망만이 있다는 것을!<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51338.zh-Hans:
<voice 02734_00051338><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>这世界没有希望，
唯有让人叹息和彷徨的
无尽绝望持续滋长！<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51338.zh-Hant:
<voice 02734_00051338><start_lip_sync n06875 _normal m00001><center>這世界沒有希望，
唯有讓人嘆息和徬徨的
無盡絕望持續滋長！<stop_lip_animation n06875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51339.en:
<voice 00040_00051339><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>The memories... Are... Returning... Those...
Haunting memories... I sealed... Away...<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51339.ja:
<voice 00040_00051339><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>記憶…が　開いて…ゆ…く……。
封じ込…めた　いまわし…い…記憶が……。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51339.ko:
<voice 00040_00051339><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>기억…이 깨어나고… 있…어…….
봉인했…던 끔찍…한… 기억이…….<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51339.zh-Hans:
<voice 00040_00051339><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>记忆……逐渐被……打开……
被封印的……那些不堪回首的……记忆……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51339.zh-Hant:
<voice 00040_00051339><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>記憶……逐漸被……打開……
被封印的……那些不堪回首的……記憶……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51340.en:
<voice 00100_00051340><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>I do... Not wish to... See them...
To hear them... I was happier...
Not knowing...<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51340.ja:
<voice 00100_00051340><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>見…たく…ない……。聞き…たくない……。
知らないほうが　しあわせだった…のに……。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51340.ko:
<voice 00100_00051340><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>보…고 싶지… 않아……. 듣고… 싶지 않아…….
모르는 게 더 행복했을… 텐데…….<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51340.zh-Hans:
<voice 00100_00051340><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>我……不想看……我……不想听……
不知道明明……才是幸福的……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51340.zh-Hant:
<voice 00100_00051340><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001><center>我……不想看……我……不想聽……
不知道明明……才是幸福的……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51341.en:
<voice 00875_00051341><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...And that's the sad story of how that girl created
her own sorrowful guardian to keep her memories
sealed away.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51341.ja:
<voice 00875_00051341><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「……あれは　あの子が　自らの記憶を
　封じるために生み出した　悲しき番人。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51341.ko:
<voice 00875_00051341><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: ……방금 그건 그 아이가 자신의 기억을
　봉인하기 위해 만들어 낸 비탄의 파수꾼.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51341.zh-Hans:
<voice 00875_00051341><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……那是那孩子为了封印自己的记忆，
而创造出来的悲伤守门人。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51341.zh-Hant:
<voice 00875_00051341><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……那是那孩子為了封印自己的記憶，
而創造出來的悲傷守門人。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51342.en:
<voice 00905_00051342><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>With this, Anlucia's memories will be restored and I
believe now I can reveal my true self.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51342.ja:
<voice 00905_00051342><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「これで　アンルシアは　記憶を取り戻し
　本当の自分と　対面することになるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51342.ko:
<voice 00905_00051342><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: 이제 안루시아는 기억을 되찾아
　진정한 자신과 마주하게 될 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51342.zh-Hans:
<voice 00905_00051342><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>这样安露西雅就能取回记忆，
面对真正的自己了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51342.zh-Hant:
<voice 00905_00051342><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>這樣安露西亞就能取回記憶，
面對真正的自己了吧。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51343.en:
<voice 00945_00051343><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>Nevertheless... If she can accept her painful past, she
can overcome anything.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51343.ja:
<voice 00945_00051343><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「でも……　今の彼女なら
　どんな　つらい過去も　乗り越えられるはず。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51343.ko:
<voice 00945_00051343><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 지금의 그 아이라면
　그 어떤 고통스러운 과거도 이겨낼 테죠.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51343.zh-Hans:
<voice 00945_00051343><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>不过……我相信现在的她，
再痛苦的过去也能够承受。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51343.zh-Hant:
<voice 00945_00051343><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>但是……現在的她無論是再怎麼痛苦的過去，
應該也能夠跨越。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51344.en: <voice 00995_00051344><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>...Come. Let us meet with her now.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51344.ja: <voice 00995_00051344><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>「……さあ　あの子を迎えに行きましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51344.ko: <voice 00995_00051344><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>: ……자, 그 아이를 데리러 가죠.<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51344.zh-Hans: <voice 00995_00051344><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……来吧，去迎接那孩子吧。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51344.zh-Hant: <voice 00995_00051344><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>……來吧，去迎接那孩子吧。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51345.en: <voice 00355_00051345><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...Are you ready, Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51345.ja: <voice 00355_00051345><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「……支度はできたか　アンルシア。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51345.ko: <voice 00355_00051345><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: ……준비 다 됐어? 안루시아.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51345.zh-Hans: <voice 00355_00051345><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……做好准备了吗，安露西雅？<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51345.zh-Hant: <voice 00355_00051345><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……做好準備了嗎，安露西亞？<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51346.en: <voice 00515_00051346><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>I am, Brother. Please come in.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51346.ja: <voice 00515_00051346><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「ええ　兄さま。どうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51346.ko: <voice 00515_00051346><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>: 네, 오라버니. 들어오세요.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51346.zh-Hans: <voice 00515_00051346><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>好了，兄长大人。请进。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51346.zh-Hant: <voice 00515_00051346><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>是的，兄長。請進。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51347.en:
<voice 00650_00051347><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>It's terrible out there... The Great Demon King's army
is right outside the castle.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51347.ja:
<voice 00650_00051347><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「外は　ひどい有様だ……。
　グランゼドーラ城の　すぐ外まで
　大魔王の軍勢が　押し寄せている。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51347.ko:
<voice 00650_00051347><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 바깥은 처참한 상황이야…….
　그랑제도라성 코앞까지
　대마왕의 군세가 밀려들고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51347.zh-Hans:
<voice 00650_00051347><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>外面看起来很糟糕……
大魔王的军队已经来到
古兰泽朵拉城的城门附近了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51347.zh-Hant:
<voice 00650_00051347><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>外面看起來很糟糕……
大魔王的軍隊已經來到
古蘭澤朵拉城的城門附近了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51348.en:
<voice 00770_00051348><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Even the walls of this mighty castle will not hold
much longer. The next battle will be the decisive
one.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51348.ja:
<voice 00770_00051348><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「堅固を誇る　この城の城壁とて
　長くは　もたないだろう。
　……次の戦いが　決戦になるぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51348.ko:
<voice 00770_00051348><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 견고하기로 이름난 이 성의 성벽도
　오래 버티진 못할 거다.
　……다음 전투에서 결판이 나겠지.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51348.zh-Hans:
<voice 00770_00051348><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>就算是以坚固闻名的这座城墙，
恐怕也坚持不了多久吧。
……下一场就是决战了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51348.zh-Hant:
<voice 00770_00051348><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>就算是以堅固聞名的這座城牆，
恐怕也堅持不了多久吧。
……下一場就是決戰了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51349.en: <voice 00950_00051349><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>So it's finally come...<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51349.ja: <voice 00950_00051349><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「いよいよなのね……。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51349.ko: <voice 00950_00051349><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>: 드디어 이 순간이 왔군요…….<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51349.zh-Hans: <voice 00950_00051349><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>终于要开始了呢……<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51349.zh-Hant: <voice 00950_00051349><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>終於要開始了呢……<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51350.en:
<voice 01110_00051350><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>I had your sword reworked. It should be stronger than
ever before.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51350.ja:
<voice 01110_00051350><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「お前の剣を　きたえなおしてもらったよ。
　前よりも　丈夫になっているはずだ。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51350.ko:
<voice 01110_00051350><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 네 검을 다시 벼려 달라고 했다.
　전보다 더 튼튼해졌을 거야.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51350.zh-Hans:
<voice 01110_00051350><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>我请人重新锻造了你的剑，
应该比之前更坚固。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51350.zh-Hant:
<voice 01110_00051350><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>我重新鍛鑄妳的劍了，
應該比之前更堅固。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51351.en: <voice 01290_00051351><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>Thank you, Big Brother Toma!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51351.ja: <voice 01290_00051351><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　トーマ兄さま！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51351.ko: <voice 01290_00051351><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>: 고마워요, 토마 오라버니!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51351.zh-Hans: <voice 01290_00051351><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>谢谢你，托玛兄长大人！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51351.zh-Hant: <voice 01290_00051351><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>謝謝你，托瑪兄長！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51352.en:
<voice 01470_00051352><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Anlucia. If it were up to me, I wouldn't let you go
to that bloody battlefield, but...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51352.ja:
<voice 01470_00051352><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「アンルシア。できることなら
　お前を　あんな　血なまぐさい戦場に
　連れていきたくはないんだけどね……。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51352.ko:
<voice 01470_00051352><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 안루시아, 가능하면
　널 그런 피비린내 나는 전장에
　데려가고 싶지 않다만…….<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51352.zh-Hans:
<voice 01470_00051352><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>安露西雅，可以的话，
我不想带你去
血腥味那么重的战场……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51352.zh-Hant:
<voice 01470_00051352><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>安露西亞，可以的話，
我不想帶妳去
血腥味那麼重的戰場……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51353.en: <voice 01797_00051353><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>...I've become much stronger. My skill with a sword is just as good as yours. So, not another word about me not coming.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51353.ja:
<voice 01797_00051353><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「……私も　強くなったわ。
　剣のウデだって　兄さまに劣らないもの。
　だから　それはもう　言いっこなしです。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51353.ko:
<voice 01797_00051353><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>: ……저도 이제 강해졌어요.
　검술 실력도 오라버니 못지않은걸요.
　그러니 이제 그 얘기는 그만하기로 해요.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51353.zh-Hans:
<voice 01797_00051353><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>……我也变强了，
我的剑术不会输给兄长大人，
所以请别这么说。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51353.zh-Hant:
<voice 01797_00051353><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>……我也變強了，
我的劍術不在兄長之下，
所以請別這麼說。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51354.en: <voice 01947_00051354><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>If it comes down to it, I will protect you!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51354.ja:
<voice 01947_00051354><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「いざとなったら　勇者の兄さまを
　私が　守ってさしあげるわ！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51354.ko:
<voice 01947_00051354><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>: 여차할 때는 용사인 오라버니를
　제가 지켜드릴게요!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51354.zh-Hans:
<voice 01947_00051354><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>要是有个万一，
我会守护身为勇者的兄长大人！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51354.zh-Hant:
<voice 01947_00051354><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>要是有個萬一，
我會守護身為勇者的兄長的！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51355.en:
<voice 02107_00051355><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Good grief, I guess it's a good thing when a princess is
a bit of a tomboy, huh?<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51355.ja:
<voice 02107_00051355><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「まったく　一国の姫君として
　おてんばが過ぎるのも　考えものだな。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51355.ko:
<voice 02107_00051355><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 나 원, 일국의 공주가
　너무 씩씩해도 탈이라니까.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51355.zh-Hans:
<voice 02107_00051355><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>真是的，你身为一国的公主，
说这种话会被认为不够稳重。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51355.zh-Hant:
<voice 02107_00051355><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>真是的，妳身為一國的公主，
說這種話會被認為不夠穩重。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51356.en: <voice 02227_00051356><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Anlucia, just remember one thing.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51356.ja: <voice 02227_00051356><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「アンルシア。ひとつだけ　忘れないでくれ。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51356.ko: <voice 02227_00051356><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 안루시아, 이거 하나만은 기억해 다오.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51356.zh-Hans: <voice 02227_00051356><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>安露西雅，只有一件事，你可别忘了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51356.zh-Hant: <voice 02227_00051356><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>安露西亞，只有一件事，妳可別忘了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51357.en:
<voice 02347_00051357><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>From here on out, this battle is the real
deal. The slightest mistake could cost you
your life...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51357.ja:
<voice 02347_00051357><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「ここから先は　壮絶な戦いになる。
　ほんのカケラほどの　迷いが
　お前の命運を　左右しかねない……。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51357.ko:
<voice 02347_00051357><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 앞으로 처절한 싸움이 벌어질 거다.
　아주 작은 망설임이
　네 운명을 좌우할 수도 있어…….<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51357.zh-Hans:
<voice 02347_00051357><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>我们要面对的是一场壮烈的战役。
即使是一瞬的迷惘
也可能会左右你的命运……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51357.zh-Hant:
<voice 02347_00051357><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>我們要面對的是一場壯烈的戰役。
只要稍有迷惘，
就會決定妳接下來的命運……<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51358.en:
<voice 02467_00051358><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>So you absolutely cannot worry about
protecting me.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51358.ja:
<voice 02467_00051358><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「だから　お前は　絶対に
　私を守ろうなんて　考えるな。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51358.ko:
<voice 02467_00051358><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 그러니 날 지키겠다는 생각은
　추호도 하지 마.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51358.zh-Hans:
<voice 02467_00051358><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>所以你可绝对
不要想着要保护我。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51358.zh-Hant:
<voice 02467_00051358><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>所以妳可絕對
不要想著要保護我。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51359.en:
<voice 02587_00051359><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>With that sword, you should protect yourself.
Promise me that.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51359.ja:
<voice 02587_00051359><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「……その剣で　自分自身を守り抜け。
　これは　私との約束だ。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51359.ko:
<voice 02587_00051359><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: ……그 검으로 너 자신을 지켜.
　이건 나와 너의 약속이다.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51359.zh-Hans:
<voice 02587_00051359><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……用你的剑保护好自己。
我们约好了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51359.zh-Hant:
<voice 02587_00051359><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……用妳的劍保護好自己。
我們約好了。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51360.en: <voice 02757_00051360><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>...I promise, Brother.<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51360.ja: <voice 02757_00051360><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「……はい。兄さま。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51360.zh-Hans: <voice 02757_00051360><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>……是，兄长大人。<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51361.en:
<voice 02937_00051361><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>I didn't realize how much you have grown... Okay,
let's go.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51361.ja:
<voice 02937_00051361><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「気づかぬ間に　大きくなったな。
　……さあ　行くぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51361.ko:
<voice 02937_00051361><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 언제 이렇게 훌쩍 컸는지 모르겠구나.
　……자, 가자.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51361.zh-Hans:
<voice 02937_00051361><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>不知不觉，你也长这么大了。
……走吧。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51361.zh-Hant:
<voice 02937_00051361><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>不知不覺，妳也長這麼大了。
……走吧。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51363.en: <voice 00588_00051363><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>...What a fool you are.<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51363.ja: <voice 00588_00051363><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>「……とんだ　道化者よな。<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51363.zh-Hans: <voice 00588_00051363><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>……真是可笑啊。<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51363.zh-Hant: <voice 00588_00051363><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>……真是可笑啊。<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51364.en:
<voice 00693_00051364><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>I came to see what the descendants of Gran Zedora
had in store for me, but...<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51364.ja:
<voice 00693_00051364><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>「かつて　我ら魔族に　煮え湯を飲ませた
　グランゼドーラの勇者の末裔が
　どんなものかと　見にきたが……<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51364.ko:
<voice 00693_00051364><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>: 일찍이 우리 마족에게 고배를 마시게 한
　그랑제도라 용사의 후예가
　어떤 자인가 궁금해서 와 봤더니……<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51364.zh-Hans:
<voice 00693_00051364><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>我本是想来看看过去曾背叛了我魔族的
古兰泽朵拉的勇者后裔，
究竟是个什么样子……<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51364.zh-Hant:
<voice 00693_00051364><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>我本是想來看看過去曾背叛了我魔族的
古蘭澤朵拉的勇者後裔，
究竟是個什麼樣子……<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51365.en:
<voice 00803_00051365><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>You are no match for the Great Demon King! Now,
sacrifice yourself before me!<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51365.ja:
<voice 00803_00051365><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>「しょせん　この程度か。
　……大魔王様の足元にも　及ばぬ。
　このまま　大魔王様への贄としてくれる！<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51365.ko:
<voice 00803_00051365><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>: 고작 이 정도인가.
　……대마왕님의 발끝에도 못 미치는구나.
　이대로 대마왕님께 제물로 바쳐 주마!<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51365.zh-Hans:
<voice 00803_00051365><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>没想到也不过如此。
……连大魔王大人的脚趾头都比不上。
你就乖乖成为献给大魔王大人的祭品吧！<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51365.zh-Hant:
<voice 00803_00051365><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>沒想到也不過如此。
……連大魔王大人的腳趾頭都比不上。
你就乖乖成為獻給大魔王大人的祭品吧！<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51366.ja: <voice 00983_00051366><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「兄さまっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51366.zh-Hans: <voice 00983_00051366><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>兄长大人！！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51367.en: <voice 01285_00051367><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>The Hero will never fall to a Demon King!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51367.ja: <voice 01285_00051367><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>「勇者は　魔王になど屈しない！！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51367.ko: <voice 01285_00051367><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>: 용사는 마왕에게 지지 않아!!<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51367.zh-Hans: <voice 01285_00051367><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>勇者绝不会屈服于魔王！！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51367.zh-Hant: <voice 01285_00051367><start_lip_sync n02298 _normal m00001>勇者絕不會屈服於魔王！！<stop_lip_animation n02298 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51368.ja: <voice 01340_00051368><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「アンルシア……！<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51368.zh-Hans: <voice 01340_00051368><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>安露西雅……！<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51368.zh-Hant: <voice 01340_00051368><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>安露西亞……！<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51370.en: <voice 01871_00051370><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>Kukukuk... I see now, how ironic.<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51370.ja:
<voice 01871_00051370><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>「クックック……。
　なるほど　皮肉なことだな。<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51370.ko:
<voice 01871_00051370><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>: 큭큭큭…….
　그래, 이거 참 얄궂군.<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51370.zh-Hans:
<voice 01871_00051370><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
原来如此，还真讽刺。<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51370.zh-Hant:
<voice 01871_00051370><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
原來如此，還真諷刺。<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51372.en: <voice 02130_00051372><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>...You, True Hero. I will take your soul.<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51372.ja:
<voice 02130_00051372><start_lip_sync m50075 _normal m00001>「……真の勇者よ。
　貴様の魂　もらいうけるぞ。<stop_lip_animation m50075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51372.ko:

51390.zh-Hant: <voice 01837_00051390><start_lip_sync n02084 _normal m00001>早啊，安露西亞。<stop_lip_animation n02084 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51395.ko: <voice 02762_00051395><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 그렇지 않아, 안루시아.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51395.zh-Hans: <voice 02762_00051395><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>你误会了，安露西雅。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51395.zh-Hant: <voice 02762_00051395><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>妳誤會了，安露西亞。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51396.en: <voice 02922_00051396><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>...I was happy. I was proud to be able to protect you.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51396.ja:
<voice 02922_00051396><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「……私は　しあわせだった。
　お前を守れることが　私の誇りだったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51396.ko:
<voice 02922_00051396><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: ……난 행복했어.
　널 지킬 수 있다는 게 내 자랑이었다.<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51396.zh-Hans:
<voice 02922_00051396><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……我很幸福。
能够守护你，是我的骄傲。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51396.zh-Hant:
<voice 02922_00051396><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>……我很幸福。
能夠守護妳，是我的驕傲。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51397.en:
<voice 03092_00051397><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>If I have one regret... It's that I didn't get to see you
awaken as the Hero...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51397.ja:
<voice 03092_00051397><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「ただ……　ひとつだけ心残りがあるとすれば
　それは　勇者として目覚めた　お前の姿を
　見られなかったこと……。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51397.ko:
<voice 03092_00051397><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 다만…… 한 가지 여한이 있다면
　용사로 각성한 널 보지 못했다는 거다…….<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51397.zh-Hans:
<voice 03092_00051397><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>只不过……我唯一遗憾的，
就是没能看见
觉醒为勇者的你的模样。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51397.zh-Hant:
<voice 03092_00051397><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>只不過……我唯一遺憾的，
就是沒能看見
覺醒為勇者的妳的模樣。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

52428.en: <voice 03467_00052428><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>Now, Anlucia. Please make my dream come true...<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>

<voice 03467_00052428><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>「さあ　アンルシア。
　私の夢を　かなえてくれ……。<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52428.ko:
<voice 03467_00052428><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>: 자, 안루시아.
　내 꿈을 이뤄다오…….<stop_lip_animation n02083 CLOSE_MOUTH>
52428.zh-Hans:
<voice 03467_00052428><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>来吧，安露西雅，

52428.zh-Hant:
<voice 03467_00052428><start_lip_sync n02083 _normal m00001>來吧，安露西亞，
